item.title: 2 Questions [317 delta]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

  1. Go into whatever file handles item stats for Delta and modify the stats on whatever ring and set the strength and attack and defence bonuses really high.

2)Find whatever handles teleporting in Delta, Not sure where because I don’t use Delta, and have it pop up with a dialogue when you click on a teleport instead of teleporting you. I can’t spoonfeed you much because I am not familiar with the packaging and makeup of Delta but just look at other dialogues and study how they work and then copy one over in place of a teleport. Instead of continuing to a next chat when a dialogue option is selected, Have it teleport you.

Read full topic
